description: Rear roof extension and  installation of one rooflight to front roofslope; alterations to one of the windows at the first floor rear elevation.
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: ST_AUG 22_2 NOR_001, ST_AUG 22_2 NOR_002, ST_AUG 22_2 NOR_003, ST_AUG 22_2 NOR_004, ST_AUG 22_2 NOR_005, ST_AUG 22_2 NOR_006, ST_AUG 22_2 NOR_007, ST_AUG 22_2 NOR_008, received 25.08.2022
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| The hereby approved one rooflight to the roof slope of the hereby development shall be Conservation style rooflights and lie flush with the roof and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason:  To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the conservation area in accordance with policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
